title: GET_FRAME_TIME
content:
0x15C40837039FFAF70x96374262// GetFrameTime
float GET_FRAME_TIME();Returns: The frame time (in seconds) of the last frame.Gets the high precision frame time of the last frame in seconds.note: the example above is way less precise.Examples:Lualocal time1 = GetGameTimer()
Citizen.Wait(0)

-- Prints for example 0.01253530010581 at around 90 FPS
print(GetFrameTime())

-- This would print about the same as above, but is less accurate, ie: 0.012
print((GetGameTimer() - time1) / 1000)
codeBlocks:
local time1 = GetGameTimer()
Citizen.Wait(0)

-- Prints for example 0.01253530010581 at around 90 FPS

-- This would print about the same as above, but is less accurate, ie: 0.012
